sentences: Ladies and Gentlemen, First, let me congratulate the Bank of Korea on its 60th anniversary.
The bank has made essential contributions in Korea's economic development, the reform of the country's financial system and its integration into the global financial system.
The clear focus on controlling inflation and the strengthened independence further buttressed the role of Bank of Korea in the economy.
And recently, the Bank's timely and decisive measures helped Korea weather the global financial crisis.
Hence, there are many reasons to congratulate and wish Bank of Korea a very happy birthday!
